tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I found a good doctor near my home. On my first visit itself I was totally satisfied with his approach and treatment plan. A well experienced doctor, polite and friendly. I have no hesitation recommending this doctor to others for cardio related issues.
We consulted Dr Madhu Prabhu Doss for our parents. The doctor offered advice and explanation in soft tone patiently. We are happy with the results of treatment and thankful to him.
Friendly talk and explained the health problem in detail. Advised what should be done before next consultation.
